content.rendered:
Video Transcript:

Next, let’s explore the royalty system section.  

section 1: Managing Your Wallet –

Click on ‘Wallet’ to access the wanted page.

Here, you can view your current wallet balance.

your minimum withdrawal amount,

below that you can see your last payment withdraw

at the bottom section you can add a payment method,

via PayPal by clicking ‘manage’

or bank transfer by clicking ‘set up’

In order to withdraw your funds,

you first need to verify your account,

to verify your account click on ‘verification’ and press ‘start verification’

first, choose your nationality

for US – fill in Form W9

for non-US – fill in the W-8BEN form.

to open the form – copy and paste the link provided.

fill out the form with your personal information,

your social security number or employer identification number,

your signature, and the current date.

when you’re done – click on ‘select file’ and upload your w9 form.

after you click ‘submit’ your form will soon be reviewed by our team.

After the form you submitted is approved

go back to your wallet page – click on ‘request withdrawal’ and you’ll get a popup window.

here you can choose the amount you want to withdraw and where to withdraw it.

section 2: Viewing Royalty Reports 

Navigate to the ‘History’ section to access your royalty reports.  

By clicking the eye button, you can access the complete royalty report for a specific book.

the report provides a comprehensive view of the book’s royalty breakdown.

here you can see the book name,
author name,
the quantity of the book that was sold under which price,
whether it was regular or discounted,the book type – standard or digital,
the fee that the store took,
the distribution fee,
and the total royalty.

Royalty System, Managing Wallet, Wallet Balance, Minimum Withdrawal Amount, Last Payment Withdraw, Payment Method, PayPal, Bank Transfer, Account Verification, Verification Process, Nationality, Form W9, Form W-8BEN, Social Security Number, Employer Identification Number, Signature, Upload W9 Form, Submit Form, Request Withdrawal, Royalty Reports, History Section, Royalty Breakdown, Book Name, Author Name, Book Sales, Regular Price, Discounted Price, Book Type, Store Fee, Distribution Fee, Total Royalty
